frames.comments: ** Opening street setup—good for context but faces are small and turned away. Minimal editing beyond cool grading; serviceable establishing shot but not a core moment.
** Central act of kindness (helping an elder) with on-screen copy "23초"—very representative. Clean framing amid crowd; tasteful grading supports message.

video_flow_analysis.overall_storyline: Everyday acts of consideration measured in seconds. We move from a winter street prelude to a crosswalk where people help an elder and a bus waits "23 seconds," then to an office illustrating "27 seconds" to make coffee for a junior.
video_flow_analysis.key_scene_transitions: Street → crosswalk POV from the bus (message "23초") → office interior with new caption ("27초"). Each block introduces a concise, time-stamped example.
